clusterList.phrase: there is no excuse for the way we've played
we couldn't have done what we did had that great run without them that's for sure
i got behind early and didn't like the direction the game was headed but we hung in there and the offense came alive and settled down
we were playing a cover 2 defense
i was down about the way we played defense against kentucky
